title: Chinese scientists develop AI model to push deep-space exploration
description: Chinese scientists created new artificial intelligence model that greatly improves way astronomers capture and study images of deep space.
content: Chinese scientists have created a new artificial intelligence model that greatly improves the way astronomers capture and study images of deep space. The research was carried out by a team from Tsinghua University, which combined expertise in computa... [2753 chars]

title: We could soon solve the world’s biggest archaeological puzzle
description: Artificial intelligence is helping archaeologists unlock Earth’s oldest secrets of the Nazca Lines left behind thousands of years ago.
content: For more than a century, giant patterns and pictures sketched into the plains south of Lima, Peru, have mystified archaeologists. Named for their makers, the Nazca people who lived between 200 BC and 650 AD, the ‘Nazca lines’ remain one of archaeolog... [12959 chars]

title: The AI tracker: This week’s developments show how AI is reshaping engagement in rural India, fashion tech, and kids privacy
description: From rural youth adoption and AI fashion tools to privacy concerns in smart toys, this week’s AI Tracker maps how artificial intelligence is reshaping culture, business and governance.

title: Global summit calls for secure, trustworthy and robust AI
description: Dozens of nations including the United States and China called for “secure, trustworthy and robust” artificial intelligence, in a declaration issued Saturday after a major summit on the technology in New Delhi. The statement signed by 86 countries did not include...
content:

title: US military airlifts microreactor from California to Utah on C-17 as Trump pushes rapid nuclear power deployment
description: The US military and Energy Department have successfully airlifted a small nuclear reactor. This demonstration highlights the nation's capability to quickly deploy nuclear power. The technology aims to meet growing energy demands from artificial intelligence and data centers. It also offers resilient power for military operations. Officials believe this marks a significant step towards a nuclear renaissance.
content:

title: Washington offers US$200 million to boost the American smartphone industry in Indo-Pacific
description: State Department subsidies for US companies to shore up US artificial intelligence supply chain in region and counter China's dominance
content: The US State Department will subsidise companies to roll out cheap smartphones running American software in the Indo-Pacific region, part of its “Pax Silica” initiative that seeks to shore up the resilience of the US artificial intelligence supply ch... [3792 chars]

title: AI, skills and 2030: Why India's workforce must adapt now
description: India is entering its biggest workforce transition since the IT boom. Artificial intelligence is changing job roles faster than traditional education and training systems can respond. The result is a growing urgency around upskilling, as workers and companies try to keep pace with a rapidly changing economy.
content: The recent India AI Impact Summit 2026 returned repeatedly to a single, unresolved question: who will prepare India’s workforce for the speed at which technology is advancing. Over the past few years, artificial intelligence has moved from pilot proj... [6944 chars]

title: AI Now Mandatory For 1.7 Million UP Staff: Govt Orders Compulsory Training Under Mission Karmayogi
description: The Uttar Pradesh government has made artificial intelligence training compulsory for over 17 lakh officers and employees across 63 departments under Mission Karmayogi Bharat. Staff must register on the Karmayogi portal and complete three courses, including a mandatory AI module. Non-compliance within the deadline will invite strict departmental action.
content:
Lucknow: The Uttar Pradesh government has made artificial intelligence training mandatory for more than 1.7 million officers and employees across 63 state departments as part of its push to modernise the bureaucracy under Mission Karmayogi Bharat.
